{% extends '!page.html' %} {# Custom template for page.html Alabaster theme does not provide blocks for prev/next at bottom of each page. This is _in addition_ to the prev/next in the sidebar. The "Prev/Next" text or symbols are handled by CSS classes in _static/custom.css #} {% block prev_next %} {%- if prev %} {{ prev.title }} {%- endif %} {%- if next %} {{ next.title }} {%- endif %} {% endblock %} {% block body %} {{super()}} {{ self.prev_next() }} {% endblock %}
